alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Berrien; Irwin; Lanier (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Irwin, northeastern Berrien, northeastern Lanier and Ben Hill Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 715 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Fitzgerald to near Ocilla to 10 miles north of Lakeland to 9 miles southeast of Du Pont. Movement was south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fitzgerald, Ocilla, Lakeland, Alapaha, Mystic, Courthouse, Greenwood, Lulaville, Gladys, Osierfield, Glory, Ashton, Bannockburn, Fitzgerald Municipal A/P, Weber, Bowens Mill, Abba and Queensland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
